issue.title: We should explicitly disable compiler extensions

content.raw:
This manifests with the following error message when compiling gazebo9 with dart6 and ign-math4:

~~~
In file included from /usr/include/fcl/BV/RSS.h:43:0,                                                                                   
                 from /usr/include/fcl/ccd/motion_base.h:45,                                                                            
                 from /usr/include/fcl/collision_object.h:44,                                                                           
                 from /usr/include/dart/collision/fcl/FCLCollisionObject.hpp:35,                                                        
                 from /usr/include/dart/collision/fcl/fcl.hpp:4,                                                                        
                 from /usr/include/dart/collision/collision.hpp:15,                                                                     
                 from /usr/include/dart/dart.hpp:36,                                                                                    
                 from /data_fast/scpeters/ws/gazebo9/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/dart_inc.h:24,                                      
                 from /data_fast/scpeters/ws/gazebo9/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTJointPrivate.hh:29,                             
                 from /data_fast/scpeters/ws/gazebo9/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTBallJoint.cc:23:                                
/usr/include/boost/math/constants/constants.hpp: In static member function ‘static constexpr T boost::math::constants::detail::constant_half<T>::get(const mpl_::int_<5>&)’:
/usr/include/boost/math/constants/constants.hpp:277:1268: error: unable to find numeric literal operator ‘operator""Q’                  
/usr/include/boost/math/constants/constants.hpp:277:1268: note: use -std=gnu++11 or -fext-numeric-literals to enable more built-in suffixes
~~~
content.html:
This manifests with the following error message when compiling gazebo9 with dart6 and ign-math4:

In file included from /usr/include/fcl/BV/RSS.h:43:0,                                                                                   
                 from /usr/include/fcl/ccd/motion_base.h:45,                                                                            
                 from /usr/include/fcl/collision_object.h:44,                                                                           
                 from /usr/include/dart/collision/fcl/FCLCollisionObject.hpp:35,                                                        
                 from /usr/include/dart/collision/fcl/fcl.hpp:4,                                                                        
                 from /usr/include/dart/collision/collision.hpp:15,                                                                     
                 from /usr/include/dart/dart.hpp:36,                                                                                    
                 from /data_fast/scpeters/ws/gazebo9/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/dart_inc.h:24,                                      
                 from /data_fast/scpeters/ws/gazebo9/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTJointPrivate.hh:29,                             
                 from /data_fast/scpeters/ws/gazebo9/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTBallJoint.cc:23:                                
/usr/include/boost/math/constants/constants.hpp: In static member function ‘static constexpr T boost::math::constants::detail::constant_half<T>::get(const mpl_::int_<5>&)’:
/usr/include/boost/math/constants/constants.hpp:277:1268: error: unable to find numeric literal operator ‘operator""Q’                  
/usr/include/boost/math/constants/constants.hpp:277:1268: note: use -std=gnu++11 or -fext-numeric-literals to enable more built-in suffixes
